QuestionText: Which of the following is an essential quality of a good teacher?
What is the main purpose of formative assessment in teaching?

In Bloom's Taxonomy, 'evaluation' is categorized at what level?
What is the primary role of a teacher in a constructivist classroom?
OptionA: To instruct and guide students step-by-step
OptionB: To act as a facilitator of learning
OptionC: To focus only on memorization techniques
CorrectAnswer: To act as a facilitator of learning
